
### restricting modification  {.smaller}


```rust
fn modifyVector(vector: &mut Vec<u32>) { ... }
fn foo() {
    let vector: Vec<u32> = vec![1, 2, 3];
    for value in &vector {
        if value == 2 {
            modifyVector(&mut vector) // ERROR
        }
    }
}
    
```
 

* value is reference to vector element
* can't give away vector
